/* USE : CdKwnMapper.getNmcodeGrpCdKwnList */
SELECT NMCODE_GRP_CD , NMCODE_CD , NMCODE_NM , 'C' AS NMCODE_ITEM_1 , NMCODE_ITEM_2 , USE_COL_NM , USE_TARGET_FG , USE_SYSTEM_FG , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '999' -- AND NMCODE_ITEM_1 IN ('C', 'H') AND NMCODE_CD IN ('139', '140', '142', '143', '144', '145')
AND NMCODE_CD LIKE '%'||#{nmcodeCd}||'%'
AND NMCODE_NM LIKE '%'||#{nmcodeNm}||'%'
AND USE_YN = #{useYn}
ORDER BY NMCODE_GRP_CD, NMCODE_CD
